name: Osylla (itch)
description:
: The game takes place in a huge old house. The mother has been thought a thought time, drinking too much alcohol and making her violent with her own daughters.

The eldest daughter wants to help her by taking her to a doctor and enrolling in a group for alcoholics, but the mother refuses. 

Now the girls are in great danger and they need your help to escape alive.

CONTROLS:

  • WASD - Move
  • Shift - Run
  • Mouse - Camera movement
  • Left-click - Lantern
  • E - Interact
  • F - Hide

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:

    MINIMUM:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4170 
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
    RECOMMENDED:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-7700 
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
